title: First Last Kiss
description: From best selling romance author, Kristen Hope Mazzola, comes a heart-warming, quirky romantic comedy standalone that will leave you with side-slitting laughter, swooning for this adorable couple and yelling "Ollie is my homeboy".  One game – one shot to prove myself. That's all it took to send my life into a tailspin.  Little did I know that even though I was not a hot shot player like my father, Gavin Hayes, or grandfather, Gideon Hayes, I still deserved to be an New York Otter.  Little did I know that in one instant my life would take on a whole new meaning – not in a hockey rink, but in a dive bar right outside of the city.  Meeting Etta was all I needed to make everything fall into place, but was I what she needed?  New Year’s Eve was make it or break it for both of us…
author: Kristen Hope Mazzola
